attributes.action: Accept Afghan war victims in U.K.
attributes.additional_details: 40 years unwanted war continues, leaving many victims, disabling old and young males and females, the war had nothing to do with Afghans, it was the 3 biggest powerful nation such as US, U.K., Eu, against China, Russia, Iran, Pakistan Afghan civilians become Victims, Afghanistan has a weak economy, weak government, never been able to produce single gun, but becoming the victims of longst war in history
attributes.background: U.K. government to accept Afghan war victims & Disadvantage children
